nodes.bodyText: How do we configure Fedora to use MySQL, for example?
The H2 in memory index was meant to exist to run tests and so you could run a Fedora with a very low bar. This is elevating it and I'm not sure we want to do that.

The primary purpose of this PR is to solve the immediate problem not being able to restart fedora without having to blow away the work directory. The secondary purposes is to consolidate the references to the database configuration into one location.
I think there are two other tasks which should be addressed separately (which I will create jiras for):

move the FedoraToOCFLIndex state into the database (currently map is written to disk)
make the datasource configurable (add mysql, postgresql, etc)
